verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H7200>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>made<s%> you as <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh;<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> shall be your <S%H5030>prophet.<s%>

You shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> all that I <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H175>you;<s%> and Aaron your <S%H251>brother<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> that he <S%H7971>let<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> go out of his <S%H776>land.<s%>
I will <S%H7185>harden<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> my <S%H226>signs<s%> and my <S%H4159>wonders<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

But <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H5414>you,<s%> and I will lay my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and bring <S%H3318>out<s%> my <S%H6635>armies,<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> by <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8201>judgments.<s%>

The <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> when I stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and bring <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from among <S%H8432>them.<s%>"
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3068>so.<s%> As Yahweh <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H6213>them,<s%> so they did.

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H8084>eighty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H8084>eighty<s%>- <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> when they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"When <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> to <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, <S%H5414><s%> 'Perform a <S%H4159>miracle!<s%>' then you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947><s%> 'Take your <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> it down <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> that it become a <S%H8577>serpent.<s%>'"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3068>so,<s%> as Yahweh had <S%H6680>commanded:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> cast <S%H7993>down<s%> his <S%H4294>rod<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and it became a <S%H8577>serpent.<s%>

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> also <S%H7121>called<s%> for the wise <S%H2450>men<s%> and the <S%H3784>sorcerers.<s%> They <S%H2748>also,<s%> the magicians of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> the same <S%H3651>thing<s%> with their <S%H3858>enchantments.<s%>

For they <S%H376>each<s%> cast <S%H7993>down<s%> their <S%H4294>rods,<s%> and they became <S%H8577>serpents:<s%> but <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H4294>rod<s%> swallowed <S%H1104>up<s%> their <S%H4294>rods.<s%>
<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H2388>hardened,<s%> and he <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to <S%H3068>them;<s%> as Yahweh had <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H6547>"Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3515>stubborn.<s%> He <S%H3985>refuses<s%> to let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go.<s%>

Go to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning.<s%> <S%H3318>Behold,<s%> he goes out to the <S%H4325>water;<s%> and you shall <S%H5324>stand<s%> by the <S%H2975>river<s%>'s <S%H8193>bank<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H4294>him;<s%> and the rod which was <S%H2015>turned<s%> to a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

You shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H3068>him,<s%> 'Yahweh, the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews,<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, "Let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> me in the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%>" and <S%H8085>behold,<s%> until now you haven't listened.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "In this you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H5221>Behold,<s%> I will strike with the <S%H4294>rod<s%> that is in my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H4325>waters<s%> which are in the <S%H2975>river,<s%> and they shall be <S%H2015>turned<s%> to <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

The <S%H1710>fish<s%> that are in the <S%H2975>river<s%> shall <S%H4191>die,<s%> and the <S%H2975>river<s%> shall become <S%H887>foul;<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H3811>loathe<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> from the <S%H2975>river.<s%>"'"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Tell <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947><s%> 'Take your <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> over the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> over their <S%H2975>rivers,<s%> over their <S%H5104>streams,<s%> and over their <S%H4723>pools,<s%> and over all their <S%H98>ponds<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> that they may become <S%H1818>blood;<s%> and there shall be <S%H1818>blood<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> both in vessels of <S%H6086>wood<s%> and in vessels of <S%H68>stone.<s%>'"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3068>so,<s%> as Yahweh <S%H6680>commanded;<s%> and he lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> that were in the <S%H2975>river,<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants;<s%> and all the <S%H4325>waters<s%> that were in the <S%H2975>river<s%> were <S%H2015>turned<s%> to <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

The <S%H1710>fish<s%> that were in the <S%H2975>river<s%> <S%H4191>died;<s%> and the <S%H2975>river<s%> became <S%H887>foul,<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H3201>couldn't<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> from the <S%H2975>river;<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> was throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

The <S%H2748>magicians<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> the same thing with their <S%H3909>enchantments;<s%> and <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H2388>hardened,<s%> and he <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to <S%H3068>them;<s%> as Yahweh had <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>
<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> into his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and he <S%H7896>didn't<s%> even take <S%H2063>this<s%> to <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

All the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H2658>dug<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H2975>river<s%> for <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8354>drink;<s%> for they <S%H3201>couldn't<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H2975>river.<s%>
<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> were <S%H4390>fulfilled,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H2975>river.<s%>
